definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
ability to make one's own decisions

sentences.english: in terms of our values and our democratic rights and whatever.
sentences.chinese: 就我们的价值观和民主权力而言，诸如此类都是如此。

sentences.english: A sovereign state would never allow other countries to violate its own territory.
sentences.chinese: 主权国的领土不容别国势力侵犯。

sentences.english: Firstly, Ezekiel had a vision of God and His sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 首先，以西结得到神的异象，并认识神的主权。

sentences.english: The issue remains that the other South-asian countries have the rights to claim these territories.
sentences.chinese: 南亚的其他国家也有权诉诸对南沙群岛的主权。

sentences.english: Hu said that China supports Equatorial Guinea's efforts in safeguarding its sovereignty and security.
sentences.chinese: 中方支持赤几维护国家主权和安全的努力。

sentences.english: Finally, it should realize the willing assignment of national sovereignty on the trans-frontier pollution issue.
sentences.chinese: 最后需要在越境污染问题上国家主权权力的自愿让渡。

sentences.english: In July, Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton challenged China over its claims to wide areas of the South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 七月，国务卿希拉蕊挑战南海主权上挑战中国。

sentences.english: In doing so, the US has violated international law and encroached upon China's sovereignty and territorial airspace.
sentences.chinese: 美机此举违反了国际法，侵犯了中国主权和领空。

sentences.english: So that Shakespeare's own sovereignty will, Been a heavy Oppression.
sentences.chinese: 使莎士比亚的自我主权心志，遭到了綦重繁重榨取。

sentences.english: National sovereignty was previously a standard held aloft mainly by British eurosceptics.
sentences.chinese: 以前，国家主权主要是英国“疑欧派”高举的旗帜。

sentences.english: Some reform of the market for sovereign CDSs is needed.
sentences.chinese: 一些针对主权信用违约掉期的市场改革是必要的。

sentences.english: The agency also slashed Portugals sovereign debt by two notches.
sentences.chinese: 标准普尔还将葡萄牙的主权债务等级下调了两个级别。

sentences.english: The independency is the magic weapon supporting China's sovereignty and safety.
sentences.chinese: 独立自主是维护中国主权与安全的法宝。

sentences.english: The US-led Nato recently declared that human rights are more important than national sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 以美国为首的北约最近提出“人权高于主权”的主张。

sentences.english: It contains inside of it four co-equal and sovereign nations.
sentences.chinese: 它包含了四个地位平等的主权国家。

sentences.english: How can God be sovereign and man still be free?
sentences.chinese: 神的主权和人的自由能相容吗？

definition: diplomatic immunity/(history) extraterritoriality, the rights (under unequal treaties) of a foreigner to live in China outside Chinese jurisdiction
